bibl.title: D.A. Hatfield v. Robert T. Hodge. Return on Service of Writ.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21: US District Court, Western Division of Washington, Seattle

div1.p: United States of America, Western District of Washington } ss:

I hereby certify and return that I served the annexed order to show cause on the therein-named Robert T. Hodge. Sheriff King County, Washington by handing to and leaving a true and correct copy thereof with Archie Hutcherson, Deputy Sheriff of King County, Washington personally at Seattle, Wash. in said District on the 5th day of Feburary, A.d. 1912
div1.ab: Joseph R. H. Jacoby U.S. Marshal.
div1.p: In the District Court of the United States for Western District of Washington Northern Division
In the matter of the application of D. A. Hatfield for a writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed in the U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington. Feb 6 1912 A.N. Engle clerk By & Deputy
Attorney for Petitoner 225-230 and 280 Colman Building, Seattle, Wash.
